about_the_game:
Become the Hollywood action hero that Östertörn deserves!

Grab your bandana, rip off your sleeves, and unleash mayhem on your mechanical foes with four lethal high-caliber weapons that are sure to get your adrenaline pumping.

This pack contains:

• MGR-6 - This rugged and reliable grenade launcher was made for chaos. A sluggish reloading process pays off with explosive combat performance. Find yourself in a tight corner? Whip this baby out and unload six rounds of heavy-duty danger.
• N144 Minigun - This is one mean minigun. Often serving as weapon mounts on military helicopters, its rotary barrel design fills the air with a hurricane of lead to bring down even the toughest mechanical foes.
• Iron Condor - Give the machines a reason to hesitate. When the rust buckets see the majestic .44 caliber barrel on your hip, they’re sure to think twice.
• RACS-12 - If things get too close for comfort, turn up the heat. Take full advantage of this rapid-action, semi-auto combat shotgun as you clear the path with 8 rounds of high-speed lead shots.

content_descriptors.notes: Player combat against machines. Occasional depiction of dead bodies. Themes of suspense.
